decimals.description: Number of decimals of the liquid staking token

distribution_contract.description: Contract where reward funds are sent

epoch_period.description: How often the unbonding queue is to be executed, in seconds

name.description: Name of the liquid staking token

owner.description: Account who can call certain privileged functions

performance_fee.description: Fee that is awarded to distribution contract when harvesting rewards

symbol.description: Symbol of the liquid staking token

unbond_period.description: The staking module's unbonding time, in seconds

validators.description: Initial set of validators who will receive the delegations
